question: Mysister in law has been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes during her antenatal blood checkups..she is 7+weeks pregnant..and her blood glucose is way upto 300..sometimes decreasing at times..she was supposed 2 hv a scan last week but d doc has postponed her scan citing reasons dat her glucose levels hv 2 *** down den only think about d baby..she is taking insulin injections nw..nxt week she has a blood  tests again..m worried if she will hv a successful pregnancy  coz doc is nt talking anythn about d baby..any1 wid same experience?
title: diabetes in pregnancy and outcome
